subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Neven Subotic, a defender for Borussia Dortmund of the German Bundesliga, has decided to play internationally for Serbia and will make his debut in the 2010 World Cup qualifiers, the coach of the Serbian national team, Radomir Antic, said.
snippet: Neven Subotic, a defender for Borussia Dortmund of the German Bundesliga, has decided to play internationally for Serbia and will make his debut in the 2010 World Cup qualifiers, the coach of the Serbian national team, Radomir Antic, said.
